summary: Replaces Unrelenting Force, Fus Ro Dah, with Fus Ro Yay with audio taken from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.
descriptionHtml:
Because everything is better with ponies. I\'m surprised nobody else did this, then I started it and realized how difficult it was. But it\'s done now so, yay. 

Someone was kind enough to do a demonstration video of the mod for me. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVL4WZ534uk&feature=youtu.be]High Elf demonstration[/url]

To install either use the extremely handy Nexus manager or extract the file in the Data folder wherever you installed the game. By default the path is 
C::\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

In the spirit of shameless self promotion, here\'s the other other mod I have uploaded so far.
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3783]Fluttershy loves Animal Allegiance[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3985]Trollestia Commands you to Catch on Fire[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4902]LUNA SHOUTS AT TIME AND IT OBEYS[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5201]Whirlwind Dash[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5981]Timber Wolves are a Howlin\'[/url]

Critique is welcome in the comments and if you notice something wrong I\'ll try and fix it as best I can. This is my first attempt at making an audio mod so hopefully everything turned out all right.
author: Snowraptor
